      boolean isFinished() 
      void setSpeed(double s)

        Returns:

      • setSpeed

        void setSpeed(double s)
        Changes the relative speed of the animation, where 1.0 is normal and 0.5 is hald-speed.
        Parameters:
        s - The new speed (must be positive).
